attributes.action: Ensure that live sports coverage of teams representing England is shown by UK based broadcasters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the people, refuse to pay foreign broadcasters to watch England games. We demand that the government protect English sports coverage from foreign opportunists. The governing bodies of individual sports should only be allowed to sell the rights to live sports broadcasts within the UK to UK based broadcasters. A new law to be introduced requiring that the sale of live sports coverage within the UK of teams representing England be offered exclusively to UK based broadcasters.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
